website_summaries.verdict: A reliable lawn tractor by a top name in the industry that comes at a surprisingly low price for the quality and features.
pros: Offers 19 horsepower and a 46-inch cutting deck that work together to tackle medium to large yards quickly and efficiently
Hydrostatic transmission is reliable and easy to adjust
Requires very little assembly when it arrives
cons: Owners of older models may find that some of the components feel slightly less sturdy, but this isn't a deal-breaker

customer_reviews.title: Big Red Machine!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nice. Its exactly what I wanted. My favorite part about ordering this on amazon is the 18 month payment plan with 0% interest. To top it off it comes in an inpressive crate delivered to your garage. By far the largest amazon purchase i have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Going Rogue

customer_reviews.title: My new mower
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mower from Amazon because local store wanted $70 to deliver but Amazon delivered free plus I got a 5% reward on my credit card and a donation to my favorite charity. I was a little intimidated when I saw the crate, but I had no trouble at all assembling it. (I'm a 70+ year old fat woman with two arthritic knees.) This mower mows well and doesn't leave any clumps of grass in the yard. My only complaint is that the Craftsman folks decided to switch sides with the mower deck lift and transmission control. Why did they do that?? The reverse mowing safety feature is more annoying than on previous mowers.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Nice mower for the price
customer_reviews.text: Mows thick grass easily. Easy assembly. one bolt for the seat and one for the steering wheel. Comes filled with oil. Gas up and go
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Not what described
customer_reviews.text: The handle to adjust the speed is located very low. The tractor is extremely uncomfortable to use since you have to constantly lean over to your left to use the handle. The speed handle is also very sensitive so it is hard to use. The turns are also wider than described in the features. It does not make an 18” turn. My assembly was complicated by missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Rotem Naftalovich

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Purchased in April.... dead as a door nail first week of June
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely horrified Amazon sells this product. Ordered it mid April and as of June 1... the motor is dead as a door nail. I cut the lawn twice... so theoretically it cost me a grand each time and now I am out 2k because of this mower. No support and cant return. Stay far away from any craftsman tool.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good overall.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lawn tractor. Stylish, fast, and reliable start. Auto-off if you get out of your seat. Multiple cutting height adjustment. The worst parts are the cup holder, it’s too small for anything but a typical 20 oz beverage bottle or can, and the tiny storage compartment that won’t hold much other than the keys when not in use. A place for your phone, or gloves, or something would be nice. As would a USB port to charge your phone. It’s saying something if these are the only drawbacks...
customer_reviews.author: CRPTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: One year old, have to jump every time to get started, even a week later. Doesn't cut thick grass well, burns belt if thick, not even that thick either. Hood is flimsy and doesn't shut correctly, never wrecked it. For the price, buy a better brand where all the little things are better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: check for oil leaks
customer_reviews.text: love the machine. PROBLEM: machine is only 6 months old maybe 12 hours running time. it is leaking oil from the front of the engine onto my drive,2 spots between the front tires. also after starting it smokes from the engine bay.white smoke that smell like burnt oil.2 year warranty on motor.need this problem fixed asap.please reply soonest. David Bloodworth, owner
customer_reviews.author: david bloodworth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic- best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Could not ask for anything better for the money. I actually enjoy cutting the grass. Never used a riding mower before and this Grandma loves it I wish it would go a little faster, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Mama P

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This riding lawn mower is the quietest I have ever owned. Works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery, assembly, and instructions by the set up person were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great running!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mower!! After having to replace the first one due to shipping damages, we love it!!
customer_reviews.author: JDL USER

customer_reviews.title: Love this mower!
customer_reviews.text: Everything from the delivery to the setup to the use of this mower was perfect. It is a workhorse and I'm thrilled with this purchase. I have used it four times now and it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Tractor gets the Job done
customer_reviews.text: Hey ya'll it's me cowboy Curtis! When I saw that I could purchase a nice big red tractor off of amazon, well gee wilikers I sure was intrigued and excited. So, I took out a bank loan and spent the last of my rent money on gettin' this nice red tractor to ma front door. I gotta tell ya, this tractor is amazin! It helps me get around when my legs are too sore from all the horseback ridin and it's great for ranglin the cattle! YEE DIDDY did that lawn mower make my lawn look fresh and the smell of the grass smells better than all of the Jack Daniels in my alcohol room. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: grass and leaf cuttings blow forward - no support from Craftsman
customer_reviews.text: While you are cutting, especially in the fall, debris blows forward from the mower deck. Particularly in the fall when trying to clean up leaves they are always blowing forward and you never get a clean yard. Debris also gets jammed in the belt covers and you cannot just blow it out, takes a little more force to clean it. I have had two craftsman before this and this is by far the worse designed one yet. When I tried to contact Craftsman about the issues, they straight up told me it is not our product, contact the manufacturer. 2nd year and it runs OK, but not worth the $'s for these problems above.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Craftsman T150 19 HP Briggs & Stratton Gold 46-Inch Gas Powered Riding Lawn Mower
product_meta.description: Style:T150: 46-Inch Hydrostatic HandPerfect your lawn for the upcoming season with the Craftsman T150 Gas Powered Riding Lawn Mower. Featuring a 19 Horsepower Briggs and Stratton Gold gas engine, the T150 lawn tractor has the mowing power suitable for larger yard jobs while the ReadyStart technology provides a quick and efficient start. Driver can rest on the mid-back seat and drive with hand adjustable hydro-transmission for a smooth ride. The mow-in-reverse feature keeps the unit cutting and trimming while weaving in and out of trouble spots around your yard—no need to pause your yard job! The included deck wash saves time for easier underside cleaning. Prevent damage to your lawn while mowing with tires that were created to keep traction on the go so to prevent skidding or damaging sod. Backed by a 2-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: POWERFUL BRIGGS AND STRATTON GAS ENGINE WITH READY START: Powerful gas engine suitable for larger yard jobs while ready start technology provides a quick, efficient start.

46-INCH CUTTING DECK WITH INCLUDED DECK WASH: Lawn tractor comes equipped with wide 46-Inch cutting deck for cutting, trimming, and clipping grass in one quick sweep. Included deck wash saves time when underside cleaning.
HYDRO-TRANSMISSION: Unit is equipped with hand adjustable hydrostatic transmission.
MOW-IN-REVERSE: Take your mower in reverse to easily maneuver in and out of trouble spots.
SUPPORTIVE MID-BACK SEAT: Back of the seat rests at the middle of user’s back for extra comfort.
DURABLE TURF SAVER WHEELS: 15-Inch front wheels and 20-Inch rear wheels for better clearance, and easy, long-lasting maneuvering around your yard.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars21 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
